original: Kusalo anuppanno dhammo nakusalassa naanuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁kusal o ▁anuppann o ▁dhammo ▁na kusal assa ▁na an uppanna ssa ▁dhammassa ▁ārammaṇapaccay ena ▁paccayo ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa. (Uppādī anuppannasadisaṁ.)
